sentences.en: Can it conceal the enormity of the economic and financial damage inflicted on the [ Zionist ] entity?
sentences.cn: 以色列能够隐瞒冲突给这个 ( 犹太复国主义 ) 实体造成的巨大经济和财政损失 吗 ?

sentences.en: Her words brought home the enormity of what was happening.
sentences.cn: 她的话让人意识到所发生事情的严重性.

sentences.en: I was numbed by the enormity of the responsibility.
sentences.cn: 责任之大让我惊慌失措。

sentences.en: I was speechless, still trying to assimilate the enormity of what he'd told me.
sentences.cn: 我无话可说，一时还无法接受他对我所说之事的严重性。

sentences.en: In careful usage the noun enormity is not used to express the idea of great size.
sentences.cn: 在细致的用法中,名词enormity不用来表示大尺寸的概念.

sentences.en: It makes no sense to belittle the enormity of the disaster which has occurred.
sentences.cn: 对于已经发生的灾难，其严重性不该小视。

sentences.en: It was not long before I realised the enormity of my faux pas.
sentences.cn: 没过多久，我就意识到自己有多么失态。

sentences.en: It's difficult to grasp the sheer enormity of the tragedy.
sentences.cn: 很难确切知道这场悲剧的严重程度.

sentences.en: Simon's mind whirled as the enormity of Morgenes'statement seeped in.
sentences.cn: 随着Morgenes医生的讲述,Simon的脑子旋转起来.

sentences.en: The cruel murderer was put to death for the enormity of his crime.
sentences.cn: 这残人的凶手因罪行的凶残被处以死刑.

sentences.en: The enormity of the crime has shocked even experienced policemen.
sentences.cn: 这件罪行极端凶残,连经历丰富的警察都感震惊.

sentences.en: The questions he raised reflected enormity of his doubts.
sentences.cn: 他提出的问题反映出他有很大的怀疑.

sentences.en: Used to symbolize enormity of greatness.
sentences.cn: 还能作为伟大事物的象征.

sentences.en: You did it because you understand the enormity of the task that lies ahead.
sentences.cn: 你们之所以这样做,是因为你们懂得在我们面前的巨大的使命.

words.tran_cn: 庞大的，巨大的；凶暴的，极恶的
巨大地，庞大地；非常地，在极大程度上

trans.tran_cn: 穷凶极恶，弥天大罪，巨大，极大
